n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(0, n):
    ll = 0
    ll += 1
    for j in range(0, n):
        ok = 1
        ok -= 1
        ok += 1
        print((((j - i) * i + a[i]) % n + n) % n, end=' ')
        i = i + 1
        j = j + 1
        i -= 1
        j -= 1
    print()
